item.title: Trash Goblin
item.description:
Title: Trash Goblin
Genre: Casual , Simulation
Developer: Spilt Milk Studios Ltd
Publisher: Spilt Milk Studios Ltd
Release Date: May 28, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Nov 6, 2024




About This Game

Trash Goblin is a wholesome & cosy shopkeeping game where you uncover and clean trinkets for sale! Customise them by upcycling and more to meet the eccentric requests of your endless colourful customers. Spend your savings to upgrade your shop, buy new and better tools, and customise your space!

A note about Early access <> 1.0 save incompatibility: It is something we'd dearly hoped to avoid, but sadly cannot. The tl;dr is that game saves from the Early Access version won't be compatible with the 1.0, but we'll arrange free access to a special branch on Steam that keeps this legacy "0.9" version live for anyone who wants it, via password. For more details, please see the pinned topic in Discussions.

DISCOVER PECULIAR TRINKETS

Unearth knick-knacks of all kinds by chipping away at the dirt and cruft they're embedded inside, wrestling with different types of dirt that yield in different ways.

RESTORE FORGOTTEN CURIOS TO GLORY

Scrub all these strange items up nice and clean with your sponge to get them ready for sale!

UPCYLE INTO IMAGINATIVE NEW FORMS!

Customise these curios by combining Trinkets together, turning them into strange and wonderful new items!

SELL TO A PARADE OF COLOURFUL CUSTOMERS

A wide range of intriguing, odd and charming customers will frequent your store, some with interesting stories to tell, others after a particular object, some just browsing...

UPGRADE YOUR WORKSHOP

Spend your savings to expand your tool set, and unlock more space to work in. Buy a coffee pot to get more done in the day, a soak tub to clean up overnight, an honesty box for getting rid of unwanted trinkets, and more!

TREAT YOURSELF

Customise your space, decorate your shelves however you like, get some nice plants, change up the wallpaper and bedclothes; make it your own!

MAXIMUM CHILL, ZERO PRESSURE

There's a gentle limit to how much you can do in a given day but customers will return, you can potter as much as you like, and there are no fail states.

1.0 FEATURES:

  • 170+ Trinkets & Accessories with 1000s of combinations & variations to find, clean, upcycle, sell and collect

  • 8 Tools to buy, upgrade and use across 3 Trinket-care minigames

  • Make life easier with the Coffee Pot, Soak Tub, and other handy gadgets

  • Expand your shop with shelves, storage, and more

  • 3 distinct locations to visit and sell in

  • Customise your shop with cosmetics covering bedclothes, wallpapers, and more

  • 33 unique NPC characters to get to know and sell to

  • 33 Quests to complete

  • Endless randomised customers

  • Endless gameplay

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Pentium 2GHZ or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
    • Storage: 3 GB available space

item.title: Kabuto Park
item.description:
Title: Kabuto Park
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Doot , Zakku
Publisher: Doot Tiny Games
Release Date: May 28, 2025




About This Game

Kabuto Park is a cute and short bug collection game . Spend a month as Hana, a little girl on summer vacation. Catch the best bugs and level them up, choose your team carefully and fight other kids to become the Summer Beetle Battles champion.

Expect 2 to 4 hours of serene bug catching, exciting little battles and summer vibes.

Catch cute bugs 🦋✨

Beetles! Butterflies! Bees! Dragonflies! And many more! Discover more than 40 cool bug species that live in Kabuto Park and try to catch them by timing your net swings right.

Win the tiniest sumo fights 💪🪲

Choose your team depending on their stats, abilities or look and show other kids who the best beetle battler is! Each bug you select for your team will add cards to your deck that you'll be able to use during the little fights. Try to push your opponents out of the ring.

Your rhino beetle is not strong enough? Feed it candies to level it up and you'll have better luck winning the next fight!

Buy cool stuff 🔍📗

Better boots or a better net will surely make you the best bug catcher! Lucky for you, the local store has everything you need to get access to new areas with new bugs, make rare bugs appear more often or make capture easier.

Features 🎮

🪲 What Kabuto Park offers:

  • A short creature collector: With 2 to 4 hours of playtime, this game is a perfect snack for an afternoon or a few sessions here and there. I like to keep my game short, to the point and respectful of players' time.

  • Simple game mechanics : A relaxing capture mini game, little bug battles with a simple deck building gameplay, a light upgrade system and a leveling system to upgrade your favorite critters.

  • A cozy mood : Summer vibes, childlike wonder, cute art and lovely music!

  • The cutest bugs : Bugs from all around the world are here and ready to become your friend. You can even pet them in your terrarium!

🐞 What Kabuto Park does NOT offer:

  • No Exploration or moving around in the world.

  • No big adventure with quests and a long plot.

  • No multiplayer of any kind. No PVP, no trading.

  • No spiders. That one is for you arachnophobes.

Dev team 🐛🐞

Hey, I'm Doot and I'm back with Zakku for another tiny game ✨

We are the developer and music composer of Minami Lane and Froggy's Battle, still on our quest to bring more tiny cute games to the world! Trained and helped by Minami Lane's artist Blibloop, I made the art by myself this time (please don't be mean I'm trying my best).

We really hope you'll enjoy our little game 💖

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), 10 or 11
    • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: Mojave 10.14+
    • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

Linux

    Minimum:
    • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
    • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: 4:3 unsupported. If you have a very potato PC and the game runs slowly on it, feel free to contact me so I can update this.

item.title: Seeds of Calamity
item.description:
Title: Seeds of Calamity
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Laborious Lark Studios
Publisher: Pretty Soon , Doyoyo Games
Franchise: Pretty Soon , Laborious Lark Studios
Release Date: May 28, 2025
Early Access Release Date: May 28, 2025




About This Game

I'm the solo developer of Seeds of Calamity. I've always loved farming sims, and one day I thought, 'What the hell, I could make one too.' So I did! Seeds of Calamity is a peaceful, slow-paced game designed to fit your playstyle. From vibrant pixel-art visuals to a relaxing day-to-day rhythm, it offers a warm and welcoming experience. Whether you're exploring, farming, or helping out your neighbors, every moment is crafted with care.

In a quiet wayside village you’d pass by in a classic JRPG – you and your fluffy Spellbook Companion tend your farm, help the community, and explore dungeons filled with challenge and treasure.

Twenty years after the Great Calamity, the land is finally recovering. As a young adventurer, you’ll leave the bustling capital to settle in a quiet village on the frontier. Here, you’ll build a cozy farm, help your neighbors, and uncover the small joys of life in a world healing from its past.

Tend crops, raise animals, and craft tools to grow your farm through the seasons! Help rebuild by sending resources to the capital and supporting your community. Celebrate the post-Calamity world with festivals, from harvest feasts to moonlit gatherings.

Beyond the village, dungeons brimming with monsters, treasures, and artifacts await discovery. With the help of your Spellbook Companion, battle slimes and bosses in accessible, turn-based combat. Gather rare resources to improve your farm and unlock new possibilities for growth.

The Spellbook Companion is your constant ally, guiding you through your journey. This magical friend helps you uncover hidden treasures, catalog recipes and quests, and even casts spells in battle. It’s more than a companion – it’s an essential part of your adventure.

Seeds of Calamity is designed with inclusivity in mind, featuring extensive accessibility options. Adjust controls, length of day, colors, difficulty, visuals, and more to ensure the game feels right for you.

Step into a world rebuilding from its past, one crop, friendship, and adventure at a time!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
    • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Any
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: As We Descend
item.description:
Title: As We Descend
Genre: Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Box Dragon
Publisher: Coffee Stain Publishing
Franchise: Coffee Stain Publishing
Release Date: May 28, 2025
Early Access Release Date: May 28, 2025




About This Game

As We Descend is a strategy roguelike deckbuilder: you must play your cards right in both the apocalyptic battlefield and the last city of humankind.

Recruit new squads of units by utilizing scavenged technology. Each squad is a unique archetype with its own set of cards which can be added, removed, and upgraded. Deploy the right composition of forces in order to tailor your deck for success against each battle encounter.


The city is the last bastion of humanity and serves as your main base. Familiarize yourself with its denizens so you can survive its feudal politics and gain allies. Roll the dice to compel those in the city to your cause. Make the most of your limited time and resources so you can prepare sufficiently for the future.


Against titanic enemies, you must rely on not just strength but wit. Adapt your tactics by reacting to enemy intents. Master the combat zone system: reposition your forces between the Guard Zone and the Support Zone in order to dodge enemy attacks and set up a defensive line.

Each descent contains countless challenges, including surviving the post-apocalypse. Scavenge the resources you need to defend and upgrade as you attempt to break through the three biomes to enter the core. Rewards and mysteries both await you beneath the surface. Even if you fail, you will uncover new secrets and begin the next journey with new knowledge and tools to delve ever deeper.

Hailing from one of the three great factions of the City-Vault, you hold the key to its fate amidst the post-apocalypse. Outmaneuver the medieval politics of the city and unearth its deepest secrets. As the first and last line of defense for the city walls, you must hold the line...

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: i5 4690k
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM)
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: i5 9400F
    • Graphics: GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM)

item.title: Near-Mage
item.description:
Title: Near-Mage
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: Stuck In Attic
Publisher: Stuck In Attic
Franchise: The Kittehverse
Release Date: May 27, 2025




About This Game

Near-Mage is a narrative-heavy adventure game with a bit of role-playing DNA that aims to appeal to hardcore players of the genre and newcomers alike.

  • Study spell crafting in the Transylvanian Institute for Magick as a Near-Mage;

  • Experience a deep and engaging story that plays like an adventure game;

  • Craft your own spell inventory, use it with different results in every play-through;

  • Dozens of vampyres, pricolitch, moroi, strigoi, ghouls, shtima - your spells change their lives for better or worse;

  • Hand-painted in glorious 4K and traditionally animated frame-by-frame;

  • Dozens of itemized outfits and hairstyles to customize your main character;

  • A game about Transylvania made by Transylvanians!

You're Illy Vraja , a teenager at a crossroads in her life who gets invited to Transylvania by her mysterious Great-Aunt, Domnica, only to find out she comes from a long line of witches, and is entitled to enroll in the Transylvanian Institute for Magick!

As a Near-Mage, you are entering a summer preparatory school, hoping to graduate into a full-fledged spell caster. You’ll take classes in different types of Magick and see how you can use your growing powers to affect the lives of those you come across .

We are from Transylvania, Romania ourselves, so we’re doing a deep dive into its rich lore, legends and superstitions, heavily drawing on them in creating Near-Mage’s dark and colorful world.

Travel freely between three main hubs: the real-life town of Sighișoara, the mythical town of Rakus, that lies beyond a Magickal veil and cannot be seen by most, and the Transylvanian Institute for Magick .

Near-Mage will allow for a lot of freedom when approaching the situations you’ll encounter within the Transylvanian Institute for Magick and its surroundings. When it comes to spell-crafting, you can choose what type of classes you’re taking on a whim, or you can look up recipes in a spellbook and strategize your build.

This build variety will in turn lead to different outcomes for some quest lines, affect certain NPCs’ fates, and result in high replayability. Maybe you’ve erased an NPC’s memory on your first play-through. What if you used a different spell on them this time around… or no spell at all?

You’ll be able to play Near-Mage as a point and click, or you can control the character directly. Walk to your objectives, run at full speed, or even fly there!

Make friends or enemies with fellow students, learn to be closer to your Magickal calling, and lift the veil off of ancient mysteries in Near-Mage!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Near-Mage will contain mild swearing and some sexual innuendo, alcohol and tobacco consumption, cartoon violence, and rare representations of dead bodies.



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

Linux
